meanings.definition: Of or relating to the front part of the head.
meanings.sent1: The procephalic features of the sculpture were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the procephalic region of the patient's head.
meanings.sent3: The procephalic design of the car made it look like a friendly robot.
meanings.sent4: Her procephalic smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The procephalic shape of the building made it stand out in the city skyline.

meanings.definition: Having a head or heads at the front end.
meanings.sent1: The procephalic insects had distinct features on their front end.
meanings.sent2: The robot had a procephalic structure that resembled a human head.
meanings.sent3: The procephalic layout of the garden made it seem like a giant face from above.
meanings.sent4: The procephalic formation of the team put them at an advantage in the game.
meanings.sent5: The procephalic design of the ship made it look like a mythical creature sailing the seas.
